name: Mexican Shrimp Cocktail
author: Sarah Z
summary: I first tried something similar to this in San Antonio and could never find a recipe that really recaptured what I had there. I experimented and finally came up with this. Anyone who has tried it has begged for the recipe. Try it with tortilla chips!
ingredients: 2 pounds cooked shrimp, peeled and deveined
½ cup finely chopped red onion
1 ½ cups tomato and clam juice cocktail
1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce, or to taste
1  ripe avocado - peeled, pitted and chopped
directions: Place the shrimp in a large bowl
Stir garlic, red onion, and cilantro
Mix in tomato and clam juice cocktail, ketchup, lime juice, hot pepper sauce, and horseradish
Serve in one large bowl or ladle into individual bowls
